blogPost.excerpt: PayRequest makes it easy to create your own branded payment page, and to send payment links to all your customers.
blogPost.body: PayRequest makes it easy to create your own branded payment page, and to send payment links to all your customers.
blogPost.title: PayRequest 2.0 - No-code payment platform
blogPost.author: Geert Jan Sloos

localize.description: PayRequest使您可以轻松创建自己的品牌支付页面，并将支付链接发送给所有客户。
PayRequest使您可以輕鬆創建自己的品牌支付頁面，並將支付鏈接發送給所有客戶。

previous.excerpt: https://easyqr.menu/ is a fully self-hosted, all-in-one QR Code Stores platform. ☑️ Online payments via Paypal, Stripe ☑️ Integrated proper analytics ☑️ SEO ready, lightweight and performant store pages ☑️ Highly customizable store pages and many more..
previous.title: EasyQR - Create self-hosted, lightweight QR code menus

localize.description: https://easyqr.menu/是一个完全自主托管的一体式二维码存储平台。☑️在线支付通过贝宝，条带☑️集成适当的分析☑️搜索引擎优化准备，轻量级和高性能的商店页面☑️高度可定制的商店页面和更多。
localize.tagline: 创建自托管的轻量级二维码菜单

localize.description: https://easyqr.menu/是一個完全自主託管的一體式二維碼存儲平臺。☑️在線支付通過貝寶，條帶☑️集成適當的分析☑️搜索引擎優化準備，輕量級和高性能的商店頁面☑️高度可定製的商店頁面和更多。
localize.tagline: 創建自託管的輕量級二維碼菜單

next.excerpt: IOON is an innovative technology that helps you turn drinking water into a sanitizer with help of silver particles. It is safe for kids, pets, people with allergies and can be even used on food. It’s portable, stylish and you can recycle it!
next.title: IOON - Smart device that turns water into sanitizer.

localize.description: IOON是一项创新技术，在银粒子的帮助下，它可以帮助你将饮用水变成消毒剂。它对儿童、宠物和过敏者都是安全的，甚至可以用在食物上。它是便携的，时髦的，你可以回收利用！
localize.tagline: 把水变成消毒剂的智能设备。

localize.description: IOON是一項創新技術，在銀粒子的幫助下，它可以幫助你將飲用水變成消毒劑。它對兒童、寵物和過敏者都是安全的，甚至可以用在食物上。它是便攜的，時髦的，你可以回收利用！
localize.tagline: 把水變成消毒劑的智能設備。
